name: lensymd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

stmt.origin: mpbid(w0, wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)), wbr(c1, cle, c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(c1, cle, c0), wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1))))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wn(wbr(c0, clt, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wbr(c1, cle, c0))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: 'Less than or equal to' implies 'not less than'. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
